definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must

sentences.english: Viagra, also known as sildenafil, is manufactured by Pfizer Inc.
sentences.chinese: 伟哥，又名西地那非，由辉瑞公司生产。

sentences.english: Sildenafil generally reaches its peak effect after about 30 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 西地那非普遍达到峰值约30分钟后生效。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To improve the in vitro dissolution rate of sildenafil citrate tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高枸橼酸西地那非片的体外溶出速率。

sentences.english: However, there are suspicions that sildenafil may cause sympathetic activation.
sentences.chinese: 但是，有人怀疑西地那非可能引起交感神经激活。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To determine the content of Sildenafll mixed in health products.
sentences.chinese: 目的对保健品中掺入的西地那非进行定量分析。

sentences.english: It's 10 years since the arrival of sildenafil citrate – or Viagra, as it is more commonly known.
sentences.chinese: 伟哥，即枸橼酸西地那非，出现已经有10年的历史。

definition: diclofenac sodium, a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to reduce swelling and as painkiller/also called voltaren 扶他林
clenbuterol hydrochloride (diet pill that burns fat)/e.g. Spiropent
pinyin: yan2 suan1 ke4 lun2 te4 luo1
